WRITING.TEXT: I just don't know what that Is I don't want to make the wrong decision.

WRITING.TITLE: Stopping hrt
WRITING.TEXT: So I decided to stop hrt after 4months but i don't know if I should have. I stopping mainly because even pre hrt I talked to more guys and it seams a lot of people my age talk to mostly girls. Also because people my age social transition early and most before hrt and I can't even do that I keep putting it off. And it also lead to me start to cutting over depression and feeling like hrt was not working snd that I will never be passable. So did I make the right choice or did I make the wrong decision? And are my fears just fears?
I am looking to cover them up right now so there not visable

WRITING.TITLE: [Skin Concerns]Self harm scars (trigger warning)
WRITING.TEXT: So my arm is all covered in marks from cutting what is the best way to hid them. https://gyazo.com/3ef679b129bd518d3f49f36d2c6e70c1 Here is a pic this is from about a 1 or 2 ago it is a bit worse keep in mind

Well before they will give you hrt there you need to meet with the person that does intakes they will just ask you some questions and that then you will be able to meet with the nurse ( there the ones that prescribe the hrt) For that it took me around 1-2 months tho it depends on cancelations and sometimes the nurse won't be there so you appt will be canceled happened to me twice. And if you live far away the nurse will work with you.My over all experience there everybody is nice never had any problems.
I really want to go see it but is a 2h+ drive to the closest theater. :(
Don't wait or feel like your alone because there is people out there like you.
My doctor said he would not let anybody just on a AA for longer then 3 months.
I baough the same one I did not like it I just decided to grow out my hair get it relaxed and use hair extensions.

WRITING.TITLE: Being outed by a manager at work?
WRITING.TEXT: So about 2 months agao ish I was telling somebody about something and I guess I said that I was trans to somebody at my job and I kinda did not want anybody to know there. So a bunch of people found out that I was trans and I had no problem the manager was even really nice the next day to me. So about a week agao I found out that she has been telling people that I was transgender I would put trough somebody at my job and he said that this person just told me that the manager told her that your trans and that he had no problem with it so I just said what ever I was pretty pissed off and I don't even know how many people she told it to week the same kid who has a problem with my brother when up to him and said that the manager was making fun of me couse I was trans and it got back to my mom.What should I do about this manager should I just let it go or confront her about it?

If you like it keep it and if you don't you can change it. I changed my name 2 times once pretty early on and the other one after I came out and start hrt. I played video games with people who knew the one name and one day I just told them that I was not going with that and and they just stopped calling me it.
If I may ask what surgeon did you go to?

I am at about 3.5m and I am sterile I was not relly counting when it happened. But once your sterile you might not be able to come fertile again to have biological kids again its really a crap shoot nobody knows. So if its important to have biological kids bank your sperm.
I did now know about it till today he posted nothing anywhere and if I would have know I would have went presenting female.

I had no plan on ever dropping out of it. I know I have to suck it up there is only so much I can do. But as somebody else said I could wear a dress that would match the suits or mabey after it during the party I could switch to a dress or something. I cant stand wearing a suit I want it rip it off right when I have to put it on.

WRITING.TITLE: Friends wedding
WRITING.TEXT: So today I got a message from my friend asking me to be his best man at his wedding well I said yes because we have been friends for just about our whole lives even tho I was a bit reluctant because I would have to present male but now thinking deeper into it I just don't know if I can go through presenting male for it. By this time I will be full time and hopefuly have my name and gender marker changed.Its just that I don't want to have to be a guy for the whole time and pretend something that I am not. He knows I am trans we have talked about it once brefily and since that we have not talked about it at all what should I do should I just go through with it as its only one night or what?

So when I was little I did not really have any sings then that would tell me I am trans atleast not before puberty. I was a fairly normal "boy" played with mostly boy toys. But once I hit puberty everything changed I got really depressed and that and I felt different from everybody and I did not know what was going on start to have massive dysphoria and I would not be till about 5 years later I came a crossed the word transgender in a video and first learned about the word. My parents did not see any sings at all nobody did I was in boy scouts when to reglious education everybody was surprised that I was trans.
So I am at 3 months and I have Gotton enough Brest growth to be a A,really low sex drive, Face change enlighten to be noticeable.
I am on 4 mg of estrodial and 100mg of spiro no other mess. I usually drink water or ice tea and what I eat varies.

WRITING.TITLE: Might be going off of hormones
WRITING.TEXT: So I got a call from my doctor today and well not the kind I was hopping for. So if it does shoot up again and I got off what will happened how long till it take to treat it? Has anyone else had this happen to them before if so what happened?

WRITING.TITLE: Feeling sick after hormones upped
WRITING.TEXT: So Wednesday i got my estrogen upped from 1mg twice a day to 2mg twice a day and 50mg still on 50mg of sprio. So before i got them upped i was fine never felt sick after i took them just took them. Now after i got them upped i am feeling sick for a bit after i taken them. Does anyone know how i can fix this or what should i do?

WRITING.TITLE: Growing on hrt
WRITING.TEXT: So I am grown a bit to where my pants are almost short I was like 5ft 6in now I am like 5ft 8in. I was under weight for a long time when I went to thr Doctor last he showed me that my growth was stunted and this was pre hrt. So I have started hrt and gaing weight why am I growing?
Alright i will check it out thanks.
I am 1 moth and 3 weeks and thanks.
Hey I was fine by your comment and thanks. Hug.

I do feel like my face is still not where I would want it to be still looks kinda maleish but from where I started its a improvement. I know about my hair and eyebrows and I am still early on so I know that I will have to give hrt longer.
What's funny and thanks
